name: Brazil AI Regulation Bill
description: Comprehensive AI regulation bill establishing a risk-based framework inspired by the EU AI Act but adapted to Brazilian context. Proposes rights for affected persons, transparency requirements, and a national AI authority.
key_requirements: Rights of affected persons (explanation, contestation, human review)
embedding_text: Brazil AI Regulation Bill. Risk-based horizontal framework. Rights of affected persons including explanation contestation human review. Transparency and explainability. National AI authority. Impact assessment for high-risk systems. Healthcare, public services, finance, education, law enforcement. Penalties up to BRL 50 million or 2% turnover. Senate PL 2338/2023. Developing economy context. LGPD data protection alignment.
